scenario_text.value: GRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWR!!!
This ain’t good! The barricade’s almost down!

At this rate, that hand monster’s gonna get
inside!
Are there any secret paths out of here?

We’d have used them if there were. This is
the only way to the outside...
Hmm...

Ahh! Hold up, there IS a way out! The place
you guys fell into before!

You mean the trap door?! Didn’t it lead to
that dungeon?
Sure did! Here, look!

Aw man, are you for REAL?! We gotta nosedive
down into that death trap again?!

We ain’t got time for your sniveling! Get in
there, already!

We can’t let Jijimon or the little ones get
caught up in this! Escape into the dungeon!

Right, Jijimon, kids! File into the hole, one
by one!

Hurry it up! This door’s about to break any
second!
Hurry, everyone! Into this hole!
Is there anyone left, Takuma?
Just Saki and Miu.
The ceiling’s caving in...!

The fog’s coming! Hurry, everyone!
It’s dangerous here!
Saki and Miu are by themselves!
Okay, I’ll head to where Miu is.

Takuma, make sure enemies don’t get close to
the hole here!

You got it, Shuuji.
All right, here we go...

There’s no other way...
I’ll go take care of Saki!

Thanks, you two!
See you after!
Miu, are you okay?!
Yeah... Yeah, thanks.

Don’t worry about it. Jeez, why does Kaito go
off on his own at a time like this?
Don’t badmouth my brother...

Oops, my bad. Well come on, let’s go before
the fog makes its way here!
Th-the fog, it’s... Eeeeeeeeek!
Oh no! Saki, over here!

Jeez, that was a close one... Thanks, Ryo!
The fog almost got me...

Forget about it.
Let’s get outta here.

(Thanks to those two, Saki and Miu are safe.
All right, now it’s my turn to escape!)
